changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO words (word, translation, example, dictionary_id) VALUES ('Effect', 'Ефект', 'The medicine had a soothing effect on her headache.', 1), ('Affect', 'Впливати', 'The sudden news seemed to affect her deeply.', 1), ('Impact', 'Вплив', 'The new policy had a significant impact on the company''s profits.', 1), ('Behold', 'Дивитис', 'Behold the beautiful sunset over the ocean.', 1), ('Adorable', 'Прекрасний ', 'The little puppy was absolutely adorable.', 1), ('Cursed', 'Проклятий', '', 1), ('Annoying', 'Надокучливий', '', 1), ('Annoyed', 'Роздратований', '', 1), ('Occurred', 'Трапилось', 'The accident occurred on the highway last night.', 1), ('Quite', 'Досить', 'The movie was quite interesting, and i enjoyed it.', 1), ('Quiet', 'Тихий', 'The library is usually a quiet place to study.', 1), ('Fair', 'Справедливий', 'The judge made a fair decision in the court case.', 1), ('Unfair', 'Несправедливий', '', 1), ('On my own', 'Самостійно', 'She decided to travel on her own and explore new places', 1), ('Appear', 'З''явитися', 'The magician made a rabbit appear out of a hat.', 1), ('Shack', 'Халупа ', 'They lived in a small shack by the river.', 1), ('Fancy', 'Модний', 'She wore a fancy dress to the party.', 1), ('Admit', 'Визнати', 'He had to admit that he was wrong.', 1), ('Crowd', 'Толпа', '', 1), ('Despite', 'Незважаючи на', '', 1), ('Participate', 'Брати участь', '', 1), ('Explore', 'Досліджувати', 'They decided to explore new markets for their products', 1), ('handy', 'Зручний', '', 1), ('Chewing', 'Жування', 'She was chewing gum while talking to him.', 1), ('Bequemer', 'Зручний', 'Some germany text', 3), ('Zu akzeptieren', 'Визнати', '', 3), ('Stiller', 'Тихий', '', 3), ('Ciżba', 'Толпа', 'Ciżba podburzonych fanatyków
